ygData.subject: Re: Question..need help....
ygData.msgSnippet: I had the same problem in one of the expansions This is what I did to fix it: 1. Start the EQ patcher 2. Once its done with its patching, click on advanced 3.
ygData.messageBody:
I had the same problem in one of the expansions

This is what I did to fix it:

1. Start the EQ patcher
2. Once its done with its patching, click on advanced
3. Click on complete file check.

The game will then search the files, most likely find a couple that
were wrong, and the game should work fine from there.

Past that you may want to try reinstalling the game, or contact
customer service.

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "bubi_g_67" <bubi_g_67@y...> wrote:
> Hi everyone,
>

the

> various sizes of human men. Now this computer is supposed to have
a
> top line graphic card, so I'm not sure how to adjust my settings
to
> see the normal bestiary for this area. Does anyone know what I
> should adjust to get things back to normal?
>
> Thanks....
